<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
Unlocks <me_SpellRage>Spell Rage</>.
<b>{DmgCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Spell Damage
<b>{CSCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Cast Speed

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Unlocks <me_SpellRage>Spell Rage</>.
<b>{DmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Spell Damage
<b>{CSNext}|floor()%</> increased Cast Speed

Spell <me_Rage>Rage</>
Rage also grants:
<b>1%</> increased Total Spell Damage per stack
<b>1%</> increased Cast Speed per stack
Recover <b>2</> Energy per <me_Rage>Rage</> stack every <b>2</> seconds

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{BarrierNext}|floor()%</> Increased Barrier
<b>{ConversionNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_BarrierConversion>Barrier Conversion</> Rate
<b>+{GlanceNext}|floor()%</> <me_Glancing>Glancing</> Projectile Hit Chance

<b_gold>Level {CurrentLevel}:</>
Whenever you use an active non-<me_Channel>channel</> skill, there is a <b>{ChanceCurrent}|floor()%</> chance to hit a random enemy within <b>12m</> with a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Whenever you use an active non-<me_Channel>channel</> skill, there is a <b>{ChanceNext}|floor()%</> chance to hit a random enemy within <b>12m</> with a <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>
Whenever <me_Rage>Rage</> <me_Overflow>overflows</>, you have a <b>15%</> chance to hit a random enemy in a <b>12m</> radius with <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strike</>
DevComment: Every <b>3s</> you have a <b>5%</> chance per Rage stack to hit a random enemy with a Lightning Strike

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
Unlocks <b>Chill - Freeze</>
<b>{ChillChanceNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Chill>Chill</> Chance
<b>{FreezeDurationNext}|floor()%</> increased <me_Freeze>Freeze</> Duration
<b>{DmgOnIncapacitatedNext}|floor()%</> increased Damage against Immobilized enemies

<b>Chill - Freeze</>
When you apply <me_Chill>Chill</>, you have a +<b>1%</> chance per <me_Chill>Chilled</> stack on target to <me_Freeze>Freeze</> for <b>1.5</>s.

<b>{LightningStrikeChanceCurrent}|floor()%</> increased Chance to cause <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</>

<b_gold>Level {NextLevel}:</>
<b>{LightningStrikeChanceNext}|floor()%</> increased Chance to cause <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</>
<b>{LightningStrikeDmgNext}|floor()%</> increased Damage with <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</>
<me_Reserve>Reserve</> <b>{Reservation}%</> Energy, <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</> deal <b>{Damage}%</> of <me_Reserve>Reserved</> Energy as additional <me_LightningDam>Lightning Damage</>

When your <me_LightningStrike>Lightning Strikes</> hit a <me_Burn>Burning</> enemy, you have a <b>{Chance_UI}%</> chance to cause an explosion dealing <b>{Damage_UI}|round()</> <me_FireDam>Fire Damage</> in a <b>{Radius_UI}|fmt(min_frac=1,max_frac=1)</>m radius
